name: Integration Test (user <-> product)

on:
  push:
    branches: [main, test]
    paths:
      - 'user-service/**'
      - 'product-service/**'
      - '.github/workflows/integration.yml'
  pull_request:
    branches: [main]
    paths:
      - 'user-service/**'
      - 'product-service/**'

jobs:
  integration-test:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    services:
      mongo:
        image: mongo
        ports:
          - 27017:27017

    env:
      MONGO_URI: mongodb://localhost:27017/integration-test-db
      USER_SERVICE_URL: http://localhost:3001
      PRODUCT_SERVICE_URL: http://localhost:3001

    steps:
      - name: Checkout repo
        uses: actions/checkout@v3

      - name: Set up Node.js
        uses: actions/setup-node@v3
        with:
          node-version: 18

      - name: Install dependencies - product-service
        working-directory: product-service
        run: npm ci

      - name: Start product-service
        working-directory: product-service
        run: |
          npm start &
          sleep 5

      - name: Install dependencies - user-service
        working-directory: user-service
        run: npm ci

      - name: Run integration tests
        working-directory: user-service
        run: npm test
